topic.fullpath: Topic :: Scientific/Engineering :: Artificial Intelligence :: Machine Learning

name: MLC-kNN1.04
short_description: This C/C++ software package MLC-kNN 1.04 consists of four kNN-type multi-label classification algorithms: OVR-kNN, ML-kNN [Zhang & Zhou, 2007], IBLR-ML [Cheng & Hullermeier, 2009] and MLC-WkNN [Xu, 2011]. All four algorithms were coded and tested using MFC++6.0. This work is supported by the Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC) under grant 60875001 and 61273246. Note: this free package is only used for user’s academic purpose. Please contact Jianhua Xu for any other purpose.
summary: A C/C++ kNN-type software Package for Multi-label Classification
